text.section: If a victim or a victim's representative has filed a notification request form under § 11-104 of the Criminal Procedure Article, the Commission, if practicable, shall notify the victim in writing at least 90 days before entering into or signing a predetermined parole release agreement with an inmate.
The Commission may not enter into a predetermined parole release agreement unless the Commission has notified the victim under subsection (a) of this section.
